TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 912
TEI.2.document_title: Jose Antonio de la Garza to Stephen F Austin, 01-10-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: José Antonio de la Garza to Austin, Bexar, January 10, 1833. Wishes to buy tobacco and cottonseed. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 912

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*José Antonio de la Garza to Austin, Bexar, January 10, 1833. Wishes to buy tobacco and cottonseed. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="01-10-1833">January 10, 1833*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
